
# This is the title of the story
#StoryName#	Things I Know

# This is the layout of the story
#Format#	side

# This is the total number of story pages not including the title page
#MaxPages#	11

# This is the maximum number of lines on any page
#MaxLines#	10

# This is the maximum number of continuation lines
#MaxCont# 5

# This is the picture scaling %
#ScaleSide# 30
#ScaleTop#  60

#Following are the lines of text for each page

<Identifier>		<-- Start of line -------------------- End of line -->

##Title Page
#Page0Line1#		Things I Know
#Page0Time1#		1.2

#Page0Text2#		Writer: Ursula Nafula
#Page0Text3#		Illustration: Michael Nakuwa
#Page0Text4#		© African Storybook Initiative, 2014


##Page 1
#Page1Line1#    	My home is in Turkana Country.
#Page1Time1#			2.3
#Page1Line2-0#    This is a manyatta.|
#Page1Line2-1#    It is my home.
#Page1Time2#			3.5

##Page 2
#Page2Line1#  		This is a camel.
#Page2Time1#			1.1
#Page2Line2-0#  	In Turkana Country,| people
#Page2Line2-1#  	keep many different animals.|
#Page2Line2-2#  	But the camel is very important. 
#Page2Time2#			6.8

##Page 3
#Page3Line1-0#  	My school is Lolupe Primary School.|
#Page3Line1-1#  	I like going to school.
#Page3Time1#			4.3
#Page3Line2-0#  	These are my teachers.|
#Page3Line2-1#  	I like my Art teacher very much.
#Page3Time2#			4.2

##Page 4
#Page4Line1-0#  This is a ship.|
#Page4Line1-1#  Ships are big.
#Page4Time1#		2.3
#Page4Line2#  	They are used to transport people and goods on water.
#Page4Time2#		3.5
#Page4Line3#  	If I go to Mombasa,| I can see a ship.
#Page4Time3#		2.7

##Page 5
#Page5Line1#  	This is a bed.
#Page5Time1#		0.9
#Page5Line2-0#  I like the bed that my father made for me.|
#Page5Line2-1#  It is comfortable.
#Page5Time2#		3.7
#Page5Line3#  	I share it with my younger brother.
#Page5Time3#		1.9

##Page 6
#Page6Line1-0#  This is a cock.|
#Page6Line1-1#  At home, we have two cocks.
#Page6Time1#		3.6
#Page6Line2-0#  We also have many chickens.
#Page6Line2-1#  The chickens lay many eggs.
#Page6Time2#		4.4

##Page 7
#Page7Line1-0#  This is a mouse.|
#Page7Line1-1#  Mice are dangerous animals.
#Page7Time1#		3.4
#Page7Line2-0#  They eat food.|
#Page7Line2-1#  They also destroy clothes.|
#Page7Line2-2#  They can cause disease.
#Page7Time2#		6.1

##Page 8
#Page8Line1-0#  This is a dog.|
#Page8Line1-1#  Dogs are domestic animals.
#Page8Time1#		3.1
#Page8Line2-0#  Our dog is called Daa.|
#Page8Line2-1#  He barks a lot.
#Page8Time2#		3.3

##Page 9
#Page9Line1-0#  	This is an umbrella.|
#Page9Line1-1#  	My parents have a big umbrella.
#Page9Time1#			3.6
#Page9Line2#  		It has red,| blue,| orange and green colours.
#Page9Time2#			4.0
#Page9Line3-0#  	When it rains,| we use an umbrella
#Page9Line3-1#  	so we do not get wet.
#Page9Time3#			3.6

##Page 10
#Page10Line1-0#  	I am in class two and I know many things.|
#Page10Line1-1#  	I want to know many more.
#Page10Time1#			4.8
#Page10Line2-0#  	What I do not know,| I ask
#Page10Line2-1#  	my parents or my teacher.
#Page10Time2#			3.4

##Page 11
